## Checklist

- [ ] Pattern follows SVG subset rules (only allowed elements/attributes)
- [ ] Pattern is a single tile that tiles correctly
- [ ] Pattern file is valid JSON matching PatternV1 schema
- [ ] Pattern has been tested in the tool
- [ ] I agree to license my pattern under the specified license
